testsuite.name: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: ACME Main Page displays page title
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: ACME Main Page displays page title Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 20.832s Then There is a title shown on the page ... passed in 0.109s And The title tag contains "Dashboard" ... passed in 0.044s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays navigation bar
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays navigation bar Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 22.420s Then The navigation bar header "ACME System 1" is displayed ... passed in 0.078s And The navigation link "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.164s And The navigation link "Log Out" is displayed ... passed in 0.109s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays breadcrumbs
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays breadcrumbs Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 25.942s Then The breadcrumb "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.133s And The breadcrumb "Dashboard" is displayed ... passed in 0.090s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays container header and note
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays container header and note Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 36.149s Then Main Page displays container header ... passed in 0.031s And Main Page container header tag contains "Welcome, " "valid_email"" to System 1." ... passed in 0.062s And Container note displays "If this is your first time logging in, please make sure to go to User Options -> Reset Test Data" ... passed in 0.082s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays footer
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays footer Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 16.960s Then There is a footer shown on the page ... passed in 0.018s And The text displayed is "Copyright Â© 2020 ACME Systems" ... passed in 0.063s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays buttons
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays buttons Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 19.951s Then There is a "User options" button displayed ... passed in 0.529s And There is a "Work Items" button displayed ... passed in 0.221s And There is a "Accounts" button displayed ... passed in 0.225s And There is a "Checks" button displayed ... passed in 0.219s And There is a "Vendors" button displayed ... passed in 0.234s And There is a "Invoices" button displayed ... passed in 0.219s And There is a "Internal Invoices" button displayed ... passed in 0.233s And There is a "Reports" button displayed ... passed in 0.560s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Dropdown menu displayed when Accounts is clicked
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Dropdown menu displayed when Accounts is clicked Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 30.472s When I click "Accounts" button ... passed in 0.497s Then "Add account modification" is available from the dropdown menu ... passed in 11.650s And "View account history" is available from the dropdown menu ... passed in 0.406s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
